articles.title: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor Is Coming To PS4, Xbox One
articles.description: Respawn’s critically acclaimed game was touted as an example of what ‘next-gen’ consoles could do
articles.content:
Respawn and Electronic Arts’ popular single-player Star Wars sequel, Jedi: Survivor, is making the leap from current-gen to the older PlayStation 4 and Xbox One consoles.
Launched in April, Star Wars Jedi: Survivor is the follow-up to 2019’s Jedi: Fa... [2337 chars]

articles.title: The fate of the N.H. nurse and her daughter kidnapped by armed men in Haiti remains uncertain
articles.description: Around 200 Haitians had marched in their nation's capital Monday to show their anger over an abduction that’s another example of the worsening gang violence that has overtaken much of Port-au-Prince.
articles.content:
Alix Dorsainvil of New Hampshire was working for El Roi Haiti, a nonprofit Christian ministry, when she and her daughter were seized Thursday. She is the wife of its founder, Sandro Dorsainvil.
Around 200 Haitians had marched in their nation's capita... [3955 chars]

articles.description: There are calls for Port Adelaide to be made an example of as the club braces to learn what action the AFL will take over Aliir Aliir’s head injury.

articles.title: Women's World Cup: Stanway ready to step up as England play China in final group game
articles.description: Stanway says she feels a "lot more mature" and is prepared to "lead by example" as England stand on the cusp of the knock-out stages. The Lionesses need a win or draw to guarantee making it through.
articles.content:
Georgia Stanway says she will lead by example in the absence of midfield partner and best friend Keira Walsh when England take on China in their final Women's World Cup group game.
Walsh was stretchered off in the first half of England's 1-0 win over... [3226 chars]

articles.title: Dylan Jones: Slowcoach, slug Britain — is this really what we want to become?
articles.description: Welcome, then, to Slug Britain. A place that gets slower by the minute. A few days ago, as I was hurtling out of Liverpool Street Tube station at 6.50am, my hand holding my debit card, ready to swipe it against the ticket machine, I walked smack right into an example of just how much Britain, and London in particular I think, has changed since the pandemic.

articles.title: Texas university system sets a bad example
articles.description: Texas A&M finds itself at the bleeding edge in a way that no university should want to be. While institutions of higher learning vie for the top spot in awards won and research dollars secured, this public university is at the forefront of official censorship.

articles.title: Study unravels how mitochondria call for help when under stress
articles.description: Originally, the powerhouses of higher cells, the mitochondria, were independent organisms. Researchers at Goethe University Frankfurt have investigated to what extent their metabolism has blended with that of their host cells in the course of evolution, using the example of a mitochondrial stress response.
